meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>animal</radical> kingdom, a <radical>snake</radical> is the most likely to commit a <kanji>crime</kanji>. Remember the Garden of Eden? The snake was the bad guy. Ever since then, snakes are the animal most known for committing crimes.
readingMnemonic: This snake has evaded the law for too long. It’s time for a true hero to put an end to its <kanji>crime</kanji> spree. Enter <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo. Han Solo is the only man strong and brave enough to put an end to this snake and his crime filled ways.
